nodes.text: Neer was a Sith Lord who was active some time prior to the Cron Supernova. He crafted a gauntlet as an anonymous gift to send to a powerful Jedi who served as the Jedi Watchman of the Corbos system. The Jedi had lost friends during the conflicts with the Sith, and when he received the gauntlet, he immediately appreciated the power of the gauntlet.

Eventually, the power within the gauntlet corrupted the Jedi, and he quickly began to murder those he suspected of even the smallest infractions. His fellow Jedi companions were forced to eventually destroy him, and brought Neer's gauntlet to Ossus for safekeeping, where it remained lost after the Cron Supernova.
Neer was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Nexus of Power, a 2016 Fantasy Flight Games supplement book for the Star Wars: Forces of Destiny roleplaying game.
